Michael Synan
Website Development and Design
I do website design and development. Mostly interested in Vue, but happy building on WordPress or without a framework.
Homelab Setup
I first got into Linux in the early 2000's in response to privacy concerns about Microsoft Windows and the restrictions they place on software. I wanted to be able to confirm that my Operating System wasn't spying on me, control what it's doing and make it look the way I wanted. That led me to Ubuntu 12.04, since then I've expanded out to Linux Mint and then Manjaro.
This Website
Built with Nuxt and Tailwind CSS, deployed via Github on Netlify.
Welcome to my website, please feel free to check out my blog and other things.
